alert.note: Alert for Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:03PM MST until January 05 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches, mainly southern Utah County near Santaquin, Elk Ridge, and Woodland Hills. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Utah Valley. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will be possible through the evening commute, particularly near Santaquin, Elk Ridge, and Woodland Hills. Widespread winter driving conditions are expected Saturday evening into Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
